import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Book } from 'src/app/models/book'; @Component({ selector: 'app-books', templateUrl: './books.component.html', styleUrls: ['./books.component.css'] }) export class BooksComponent { public book1:Book; constructor(){ this.book1 = new Book(127, 40040, "Dejar ir", "Autoayuda", "Dr. David Hawkins", 19.99, "https://imagessl4.casadellibro.com/a/l/t7/14/9788494248214.jpg") } }
{{book1.title}}
